title: Zooey Deschanel's husband files for divorce... as she cozies up with Jonathan Scott on Instagram
text:
Her marriage is one step closer to being over, but this actress isn't looking too concerned.

Zooey Deschanel's estranged husband, producer Jacob Pechenik, filed legal documents Tuesday citing 'irreconcilable differences' with the New Girl actress, setting in motion their divorce proceedings, according to TMZ. In the docs, Jacob is asking for both joint legal and physical custody of their two children, 4-year-old daughter Elsie Otter and 2-year-old son Charlie Wolf.

The move comes just one day after Deschanel, 39, made her relationship with Jonathan Silver Scott of TV's Property Brothers Instagram official, posing with a group of friends in which Jonathan is carrying her in his arms while they visit Universal Studios' Halloween Horror Nights haunted theme attraction.

Splitsville: Zooey Deschannel's estranged husband Jacob Pechenik has officially filed for divorce. The couple are seen in happier times in 2016 above

Zooey and Jacob revealed they were officially separating last month after four years of marriage, but as of Tuesday afternoon, Jacob revealed that the two have in fact been separated since January.

In a statement in early September, the pair said, 'After much discussion and a long period of contemplation we have decided we are better off as friends, business partners and co-parents rather than life partners.'

Zooey and Jacob first met on the set of the 2015 Bill Murray satirical comedy Rock The Kasbah, which Jacob helped produce.

Mere days after news of her marriage ending made the rounds last month, Zooey was spotted holding hands with Scott, 41, on September 13.

Insta-official: On Sunday night, Zooey made her relationship with Jonathan Scott even more public, via social media

Having fun: The Scott brothers were having fun on social media with Zooey's post

Since then, the new couple have not been shy about their budding romance, with Zooey referring to it as a 'pleasant surprise' when she spoke to Us Weekly in mid-September.

Since then, the pair have been seen numerous times out in public, holding hands and looking very romantic.

They even made a joint public TV appearance, showing up for a taping of Dancing With The Stars.

Scared in a good way: More of the loved-up new couple were seen on Zooey's Instagram account

This is the second divorce for Deschanel, who split from Death Cab for Cutie frontman Ben Gibbard in 2012 after three years of marriage.

Zooey's Emmy- and Golden Globe-nominated series New Girl lasted seven seasons, until 2018.

To date, she does not have a new project listed on her IMDb page.
description: Zooey Deschanel's estranged husband, producer Jacob Pechenik, filed legal documents Tuesday citing 'irreconcilable differences' with the New Girl actress.
